name: Octarine Core
lore: At the core of spellcraft are spectrums only the very gifted can sense.

descriptions.name: Cooldown Reduction
descriptions.description: Reduces the cooldown time of all spells and items by 25%.

descriptions.name: Spell Lifesteal
descriptions.description: 25.0% of spell damage dealt to enemy heroes is returned to the caster as health, regardless of spell damage type.  Lifesteal reduced to 5.0% against creeps.
